title: Bug 49299: Incorrect information about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1
description: The bug report 49299 highlights an issue with the information provided in Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 regarding the effect of custom cookie name on URL rewriting. The bug report does not currently provide any observed behavior details. The expected behavior is mentioned as well as the steps to reproduce are missing.
EB: The expected result is that if the phrase in 7.1.1 is followed, the Reload link should be:http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR:
1. Open the application at http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp
2. Perform actions to trigger URL rewriting
3. Observe the actual URL generated and the presence of the custom cookie name MYSESSIONCOOKIE in the URL
